name: ordinadigitalservices/drupal-behat-contexts
description: Additional behat contexts to be used with jhedstrom/drupalextension

suggest.drupal/entityqueue: Enables the use of the EntityQueueContext
suggest.drupal/paragraphs: Enables the use of the ParagraphsContext
suggest.drupal/profile: Enables the use of the ProfileContext
suggest.drupal/search_api: Enables the use of the SearchContext
